summary: Weapon description:"Very effective against the undead. The power of existence makes this weapon godly and yotobic"
descriptionHtml:
Weapon description:"Very effective against the undead. The power of existence makes this weapon godly and yotobic".

This is my first mod. A silver sword which can be forged in any furnace with a special enchantment that requires no recharge. This is usually a one hit kill weapon. This weapon was created in Yotobi's honour, who in many of his videos executes existance attacks and moves.

The sword has 8 enchantments:
- Absorbs health
- Absorbs stamina
- Absorbs magica
- Captures souls
- Fire damage
- Ice damage
- Electric damage
- Paralizes

The weapon retains its silver effect of a normal silver sword that strikes extra damage on the undead and werewolves.

Furthermore the weapon needs no recharge from soul gems.

VERSION:
1.0.1 - Spelling mistakes fixed
1.0 - Main file

INSTALLATION:
1) Nexus Mod Manager does all the work
2) For manual installation a read me file has been inserted with instructions.

For those that want the console code:
Silver sword of existance: xx000D62

P.S.: if you have any suggestions don't hesitate to contact me ;-)

CREDITS:
All credit for the translation goes to my brother Alberto Lanzillotti
author: GabryDX
